about_the_game:
Trail of Singularity is an open world survival game where you will need to search for items in order to craft equipment for your spaceship, food and oxygen to keep yourself alive.



You will also be able to upgrade your spaceship by adding modules located on pit stations and abandoned stray cosmic ships. It is time to embark on an adventure through the galaxies and beyond!

In the year 2207 life as you know it has changed unrecognizably, there is no Earth, nor Solar System the way it used to be. Humanity have conquered the space yet it caused the cataclysmic shift in the way we live not on planets but in Hyper Stations and Orbital Labs where life can be sustained. You will be playing as an engineer of Hyper Station in search of the last remaining Station in the radius of 3000 light years.



Man your shuttle, land on pit stations, explore remnants of other abandoned, lifeless spaceships where no human life is left but android and robots are guarding them for years following the demise of their masters. These machines are fierce and ruthless, be quick, be careful, collect your loot and don’t look behind!

You need to mend your ship, you need to craft your tools, you need to obtain sustenance and most importantly you need to survive until you find the last Hyper Station…

name: Trail of Singularity Demo
short_description: In 2207, Earth vanished. As a Hyper Station engineer, explore abandoned spaceships, face android guardians, craft tools, and mend your ship to find the last station in a 3000-light-year radius. Survival is key in this post-cataclysmic space odyssey.
